comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: That's Tennessee (Tennie) Celeste Clafln (1844-1923), sister of Victoria Woodhull: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tennessee_Celeste_Claflin

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
I made a purse from this image:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02/5459016993/]

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca,

Thanks for adding some background information on Tennie and the cool photo of the purse you made.  We love to see our images used in unique and creative ways!

Mary
U.S. National Archives

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca,

Thanks again for the heads up about Tennie!  I wanted to give you an update.  Our person name cataloger, Jerry, is coordinating with our Still Pictures Unit staff to provide the information about Tennie and the variations of her name to this photograph's record in our online catalog, and he added a biographical note to her person name authority record.

Jill
U.S. National Archives
